item.title: installing alpine linux on rpi0
item.description: Prerequisites One raspberry pi zero W One sd card Download Alpine linux We’ll use the almost latest version: 3.9.2 (3.9.3 would not work for some reason) The one to use for RPI is the raspberry pi (surprising :P) armhf. On your local computer (assuming you re using linux) Mount the sdcard (should be automated, if not, you probably know how to do that and you probably don’t need that tutorial)
